sources.title: Never Forget | Full Crime Thriller Movie | Lou Diamond Phillips | Kris Holden-Ried
sources.description:
A man (Phillips) who wakes up with amnesia also finds his supposed friend has accused him of murder.
2008.  Stars: Lou Diamond Phillips, Kris Holden-Ried, Sarah Manninen
